title: The Magnum Equation: A Cat Enright Equestrian Mystery
description: "A horse trainer, juvenile delinquent, eccentric client of a certain age with electric blue hair, and a (possibly) psychic horse lead this Southern equestrian mystery into a fast paced, lightly comic read. Join Cat Enright and her crew as she tries to solve murder and mayhem at a prestigious all-breed horse show. When horses become ill and a show-goer s last hurrah is in the port-a-potty, Cat decides to find the cause of the trouble. The Magnum Equation is the second in the award-winning Cat Enright series. "
author: Lisa Wysocky
